select.foreach: select p.*, i.image_main_url, #{item.quantity} AS quantity from products p inner join product_images i on p.product_no = i.product_no where p.product_no = #{item.productNo} and i.image_sub_url = "M"

mapper.select: select m.member_name, m.phone_number, m.email, m.address, m.member_point, l.level_name, l.level_dc, l.level_point from members m inner join levels l on l.level_no = m.member_level where member_id = #{memberId}
